com.sun.pisces
Class PathSink

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.pisces.LineSink
      com.sun.pisces.PathSink
Direct Known Subclasses:
Flattener, PathStore, PiscesRenderer, Transformer
public class PathSink
extends LineSink

The LineSink interface extends the PathSink interface, and additionally accepts curve drawing commands: quadTo and curveTo.

Constructor Summary
PathSink()
           
 
Method Summary
 void cubicTo(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, int x3, int y3)
          Draws a cubic Bezier curve starting at the current drawing position and ending at the point (x3, y3) according to the formulas: x(t) = (1 - t)^3*x0 + 3*(1 - t)^2*t*x1 + 3*(1 - t)*t^2*x2 + t^3*x3 y(t) = (1 - t)^3*y0 + 3*(1 - t)^2*t*y1 + 3*(1 - t)*t^2*y2 + t^3*x3 0 <= t <= 1 where (x0, y0) is the current drawing position.
 void quadTo(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
          Draws a quadratic Bezier curve starting at the current drawing position and ending at the point (x2, y2) according to the formulas: x(t) = (1 - t)^2*x0 + 2*(1 - t)*t*x1 + t^2*x2 y(t) = (1 - t)^2*y0 + 2*(1 - t)*t*y1 + t^2*x2 0 <= t <= 1 where (x0, y0) is the current drawing position.

Method Detail

quadTo

public void quadTo(int x1,
                   int y1,
                   int x2,
                   int y2)
Draws a quadratic Bezier curve starting at the current drawing position and ending at the point (x2, y2) according to the formulas: 
 x(t) = (1 - t)^2*x0 + 2*(1 - t)*t*x1 + t^2*x2
 y(t) = (1 - t)^2*y0 + 2*(1 - t)*t*y1 + t^2*x2
 
 0 <= t <= 1
where (x0, y0) is the current drawing position. Finally, the current drawing position is set to (x2, y2).

Parameters:
x1 - the X coordinate of the control point in S15.16 format
y1 - the Y coordinate of the control point in S15.16 format
x2 - the final X coordinate in S15.16 format
y2 - the final Y coordinate in S15.16 format

cubicTo

public void cubicTo(int x1,
                    int y1,
                    int x2,
                    int y2,
                    int x3,
                    int y3)
Draws a cubic Bezier curve starting at the current drawing position and ending at the point (x3, y3) according to the formulas: 
 x(t) = (1 - t)^3*x0 + 3*(1 - t)^2*t*x1 + 3*(1 - t)*t^2*x2 + t^3*x3
 y(t) = (1 - t)^3*y0 + 3*(1 - t)^2*t*y1 + 3*(1 - t)*t^2*y2 + t^3*x3
 
 0 <= t <= 1
where (x0, y0) is the current drawing position. Finally, the current drawing position is set to (x3, y3).

Parameters:
x1 - the X coordinate of the first control point in S15.16 format
y1 - the Y coordinate of the first control point in S15.16 format
x2 - the X coordinate of the second control point in S15.16 format
y2 - the Y coordinate of the second control point in S15.16 format
x3 - the final X coordinate in S15.16 format
y3 - the final Y coordinate in S15.16 format
